short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays beautiful nature images on new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overrides the default new tab in order to provide a picture of mountain scenery. There is no overlay, text, clock, or anything else. Just nature.

Newer versions will offer more control over the types of images displayed.
